operator.title: Write PMML
operator.synopsis: This operator will save the given model to an XML file of PMML 4.3 format.

text.p: This operator will write the given model to an XML file of PMML 4.3 format. This format is a standard for data mining models and is understood by many data bases. It can be used for applying data mining models directly in the database. This way it can be applied on a regular basis on huge amounts of data.

This operator supports the following models:
Decision Tree Models
Rule Models
Naive Bayes models for nominal attributes
Linear Regression Models
Logistic Regression Models
Centroid based Cluster models like models of k-means and k-medoids
Support Vector Machine

parameters.parameter: Specifies the file for saving the pmml.
Determines which PMML version should be used for export.
